level.heading: Issuance of rules and regulations.
level.text: The Board of Elections and Ethics shall issue rules and regulations to effect the provisions of this act, in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-1
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-1, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1001.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-88
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-88, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1001.01.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This act," referenced in this section is the Initiative, Referendum and Recall Procedures Act of 1979, effective June 7, 1979, D.C. Law 3-1.
